<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Straveika](/Feats.aspx?ID=1337) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You descend from one of the truly ancient vampires, a nosferatu cursed to eternal life but not eternal youth. People call you straveika, or ancient-born. The vestiges of your forebear's powers of domination have left you with an understanding of how a creature's intentions change its behaviors. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85) and Perception DCs against attempts to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) to you.

<title level="2">Straveika leads to...</title>
[Taste Blood](/Feats.aspx?ID=2349)
